member.name: T:MiniSnap.Create
member.summary: Provides functions for creating NX objects in the Work Part

member.name: M:MiniSnap.Create.Arc(MiniSnap.Position,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Constructs a MiniSnap.NX.Arc parallel to the XY-plane

member.name: M:MiniSnap.Create.Arc(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Constructs a MiniSnap.NX.Arc lying in the XY-plane
member.param: X-coordinate of center point (in absolute coordinates)
Y-coordinate of center point (in absolute coordinates)

member.name: M:MiniSnap.Create.BezierCurve(MiniSnap.NX.Point[])
member.summary: Creates a Bezier curve using given points as poles
member.returns: A Snap.NX.Spline object of degree m (order m+1)

member.name: M:MiniSnap.Create.BezierCurve(MiniSnap.Position[])
member.summary: Creates a Bezier curve from given poles
member.returns: A Snap.NX.Spline object of degree m (order m+1)

member.name: M:MiniSnap.Create.BezierCurve(MiniSnap.Position[],System.Double[])
member.summary: Creates a rational Bezier curve from given poles and weights
member.returns: A Snap.NX.Spline object of degree m (order m+1)

member.name: M:MiniSnap.Create.BezierPatch(MiniSnap.Position[0:,0:])
member.summary: Creates a polynomial Bezier patch
member.param: A 2D array of (mu+1) x (mv+1) 3D positions representing poles
member.returns: A polynomial Bezier patch of degree mu x mv

member.name: M:MiniSnap.Create.BezierPatch(MiniSnap.Position[0:,0:],System.Double[0:,0:])
member.summary: Creates a rational Bezier patch
member.param: A 2D array of (mu+1) x (mv+1) 3D positions representing poles
A 2D array of (mu+1) x (mv+1) values representing weights
member.returns: A rational Bezier patch of degree mu x mv

member.name: M:MiniSnap.Create.Bsurface(MiniSnap.Position[0:,0:],System.Double[],System.Double[])
member.summary: Constructs a polynomial b-surface from poles and knot sequences
member.param: A 2D array of nu x nv 3D poles
Knots for u-direction -- an array of nu+ku knot values : u[0], ... , u[nu+ku-1]
Knots for v-direction -- an array of nv+kv knot values : v[0], ... , v[nv+kv-1]
member.returns: A NX.Bsurface object, which is a body having a single face.

member.name: M:MiniSnap.Create.BsurfaceThroughPoints(MiniSnap.Position[0:,0:],System.Double[],System.Double[],System.Double[],System.Double[])
member.summary: Creates a Bsurface interpolating (passing through) a given array of points
member.param: An nu x nv array of points to be interpolated
The nu parameter u-values at which to interpolate (aka nodes)
The nv parameter v-values at which to interpolate (aka nodes)
Knots for u-direction -- an array of nu+ku knot values : u[0], ... , u[nu+ku-1]
Knots for v-direction -- an array of nv+kv knot values : v[0], ... , v[nv+kv-1]
member.returns: A Bsurface interpolating the given points at the given (u,v) values

member.name: M:MiniSnap.Create.Circle(MiniSnap.Position,MiniSnap.Position,MiniSnap.Position)
member.summary: Create a circle through three points
member.returns: Circle (360 degrees) passing through the 3 points

member.name: M:MiniSnap.Create.Circle(MiniSnap.Position,MiniSnap.Vector,System.Double)
member.summary: Constructs a circle from center, normal, radius
member.param: Unit vector normal to plane of circle

member.name: M:MiniSnap.Create.Circle(MiniSnap.Position,System.Double)
member.summary: Constructs a circle parallel to the XY-plane

member.name: M:MiniSnap.Create.Circle(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Constructs a circle lying in the XY-plane
member.param: X-coordinate of center point (in absolute coordinates)
Y-coordinate of center point (in absolute coordinates)

member.name: M:MiniSnap.Create.Cylinder(MiniSnap.Position,MiniSnap.Vector,MiniSnap.Number,MiniSnap.Number)
member.summary: Create a cylinder feature, given base point, axis vector, height, and diameter
member.param: The cylinder axis position (center of base arc)
The cylinder axis vector (length doesn't matter)
Number object representing height of cylinder (must be positive)
Number object representing diameter of cylinder

member.name: M:MiniSnap.Create.Line(MiniSnap.NX.Point,MiniSnap.NX.Point)
member.summary: Create a line between two points (NX.Point objects)

member.name: M:MiniSnap.Create.Line(MiniSnap.Position,MiniSnap.Position)
member.summary: Create a line between two positions

member.name: M:MiniSnap.Create.Line(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Construct a line, given x,y coordinates of its end-points (z assumed zero)

member.name: M:MiniSnap.Create.Point(MiniSnap.Position)
member.summary: Create a point from a position

member.name: M:MiniSnap.Create.Point(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Create a point from xy-coordinates (assumes z=0)

member.name: M:MiniSnap.Create.Point(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Create a point from x, y, z coordinates

member.name: M:MiniSnap.Create.Point(System.Double[])
member.summary: Create a point from an array of 3 coordinates

member.name: M:MiniSnap.Create.Sphere(MiniSnap.NX.Point,MiniSnap.Number)
member.summary: Create a sphere feature, given center point and diameter

member.name: M:MiniSnap.Create.Sphere(MiniSnap.Position,MiniSnap.Number)
member.summary: Create a sphere feature, given center position and diameter

member.name: M:MiniSnap.Create.Sphere(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,MiniSnap.Number)
member.summary: Create a sphere feature, given center coordinates and diameter

member.name: M:MiniSnap.Create.Spline(System.Double[],MiniSnap.Position[])
member.summary: Creates a polynomial spline curve from knots and poles
member.param: Knots -- an array of n+k knot values : t[0], ... , t[n+k-1]
An array of n 3D positions representing poles

member.name: M:MiniSnap.Create.Spline(System.Double[],MiniSnap.Position[],System.Double[])
member.summary: Creates a rational spline curve from knots, poles, and weights
member.param: Knots -- an array of n+k knot values : t[0], ... , t[n+k-1]
An array of n 3D positions representing poles
An array of n weight values

member.name: M:MiniSnap.Create.Unite(MiniSnap.NX.Body,MiniSnap.NX.Body[])
member.summary: Unites an array of tool bodies with a target body
member.returns: Snap.NX.Boolean feature formed by uniting tools with target

member.name: T:MiniSnap.InfoWindow
member.summary: Provides functions to write output to the NX Information window (sometimes known as the "Listing" window).

member.name: M:MiniSnap.InfoWindow.Clear
member.summary: Clear the Info Window

member.name: M:MiniSnap.InfoWindow.Close
member.summary: Closes the Information window

member.name: M:MiniSnap.InfoWindow.Write(System.String)
member.summary: Write a string to the Info window (with no newline added)

member.name: M:MiniSnap.InfoWindow.WriteLine(System.String)
member.summary: Write a string to the Info window (with a newline added)

member.name: T:MiniSnap.Number
member.summary: Class to allow either double or string inputs when creating features

member.name: M:MiniSnap.Number.ToString
member.summary: Produce a string representation of a Number object

member.name: F:MiniSnap.Number.Zero
member.summary: The Number representing zero

member.name: T:MiniSnap.Orientation
member.summary: Represents an orientation in 3D space (interchangeable with NXOpen.Matrix3x3)

member.name: M:MiniSnap.Orientation.#ctor
member.summary: Constructor for the identity Orientation

member.name: M:MiniSnap.Orientation.#ctor(MiniSnap.Vector)
member.summary: Constructor, given a Z-axis vector
member.param: Vector to be used as the Z-axis of the orientation (length doesn't matter)
member.returns: Orientation having the given vector as its Z-axis

member.name: M:MiniSnap.Orientation.#ctor(MiniSnap.Vector,MiniSnap.Vector)
member.summary: Constructor, given X and Y axes

member.name: M:MiniSnap.Orientation.#ctor(MiniSnap.Vector,MiniSnap.Vector,MiniSnap.Vector)
member.summary: Constructor, given three orthogonal unit vectors
member.param: Unit vector to be used as X-axis
Unit vector to be used as Y-axis
Unit vector to be used as Z-axis

member.name: M:MiniSnap.Orientation.#ctor(NXOpen.Matrix3x3)
member.summary: Constructor, given an NXOpen.Matrix3x3 object

member.name: P:MiniSnap.Orientation.Array
member.summary: The array representation of the orientation

member.name: P:MiniSnap.Orientation.AxisX
member.summary: The X-axis of the orientation (unit vector)

member.name: P:MiniSnap.Orientation.AxisY
member.summary: The Y-axis of the orientation (unit vector)

member.name: P:MiniSnap.Orientation.AxisZ
member.summary: The Z-axis of the orientation (unit vector)

member.name: P:MiniSnap.Orientation.Identity
member.summary: Returns the identity Orientation

member.name: T:MiniSnap.Position
member.summary: Represents a position in 3D space (interchangeable with NXOpen.Point3d)

member.name: M:MiniSnap.Position.#ctor(MiniSnap.NX.Point)
member.summary: Creates a position from An NX.Point object

member.name: M:MiniSnap.Position.#ctor(NXOpen.Point)
member.summary: Creates a position from an NXOpen.Point object

member.name: M:MiniSnap.Position.#ctor(NXOpen.Point3d)
member.summary: Creates a position from an NXOpen.Point3d object

member.name: M:MiniSnap.Position.#ctor(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Creates a position from x and y coordinates (z assumed = 0)

member.name: M:MiniSnap.Position.#ctor(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Creates a position from three rectangular coordinates

member.name: M:MiniSnap.Position.#ctor(System.Double[])
member.summary: Creates a position from an array of three coordinates

member.name: P:MiniSnap.Position.Array
member.summary: Array of the coordinates of the position

member.name: M:MiniSnap.Position.GetX(MiniSnap.Position[0:,0:])
member.summary: Generate a 2D array of X-coordinates from a 2D array of positions
member.param: Array of positions v00, v01, ..., vmn
member.returns: Array of coordinates v00.X, v01.X, ... , vmn.X

member.name: M:MiniSnap.Position.GetX(MiniSnap.Position[])
member.summary: Generate an array of X-coordinates from an array of positions
member.param: Array of positions v0, v1, ..., vn
member.returns: Array of coordinates v0.X, v1.X, ... , vn.X

member.name: M:MiniSnap.Position.GetXYZ(MiniSnap.Position[])
member.summary: Generate an array of XYZ coordinates from an array of positions
member.param: Array of positions v0, v1, ..., vn
member.returns: Array of coordinates v0.X, v0.Y, v0.Z, v1.X, v1.Y, v1.Z, ... , vn.Z

member.name: M:MiniSnap.Position.GetY(MiniSnap.Position[0:,0:])
member.summary: Generate a 2D array of Y-coordinates from a 2D array of positions
member.param: Array of positions p00, p01, ..., pmn
member.returns: Array of Y-coordinates p00.Y, p01.Y, ... , pmn.Y

member.name: M:MiniSnap.Position.GetY(MiniSnap.Position[])
member.summary: Generate an array of Y-coordinates from an array of positions
member.param: Array of vectors v0, v1, ..., vn
member.returns: Array of coordinates v0.Y, v1.Y, ... , vn.Y

member.name: M:MiniSnap.Position.GetZ(MiniSnap.Position[0:,0:])
member.summary: Generate a 2D array of Z-coordinates from a 2D array of positions
member.param: Array of positions v00, v01, ..., vmn
member.returns: Array of coordinates v00.Z, v01.Z, ... , vmn.Z

member.name: M:MiniSnap.Position.GetZ(MiniSnap.Position[])
member.summary: Generate an array of Z-coordinates from an array of positions
member.param: Array of positions p0, p1, ..., pn
member.returns: Array of Z-coordinates p0.Z, p1.Z, ... , pn.Z

member.name: M:MiniSnap.Position.op_Addition(MiniSnap.Position,MiniSnap.Position)
member.summary: Adds two positions using the "+" notation
member.returns: Sum of two positions: u + v

member.name: M:MiniSnap.Position.op_Addition(MiniSnap.Position,MiniSnap.Vector)
member.summary: Adds a position and a vector using the "+" notation
member.returns: Sum of position and vector: u + v

member.name: M:MiniSnap.Position.op_Division(MiniSnap.Position,System.Double)
member.summary: Divides a position by a scalar using "/" notation

member.name: M:MiniSnap.Position.op_Multiply(System.Double,MiniSnap.Position)
member.summary: Multiplies a position by a scalar using "*" notation

member.name: M:MiniSnap.Position.op_Multiply(System.Int32,MiniSnap.Position)
member.summary: Multiplies a position by a scalar using "*" notation

member.name: M:MiniSnap.Position.op_Subtraction(MiniSnap.Position,MiniSnap.Position)
member.summary: Subtracts two positions using the "-" notation
member.returns: Vector representing difference of two positions: u - v

member.name: M:MiniSnap.Position.op_Subtraction(MiniSnap.Position,MiniSnap.Vector)
member.summary: Subtracts a vector from a position using the "-" notation

member.name: M:MiniSnap.Position.op_UnaryNegation(MiniSnap.Position)
member.summary: Negates (reverses) a position using the "-" notation

member.name: F:MiniSnap.Position.Origin
member.summary: A position corresponding to the origin -- (0,0,0)

member.name: M:MiniSnap.Position.PositionsFromCoordinates(System.Double[],System.Double[],System.Double[])
member.summary: Build an array of positions from three arrays of coordinates
member.param: Array of x-coordinates x00, x01, ... , xmn
Array of y-coordinates y00, y01, ... , ymn
Array of z-coordinates z00, z01, ... , zmn
member.returns: Array of positions v0, v1, ..., vn, where v[i] = ( x[i], y[i] z[i] )

member.name: M:MiniSnap.Position.ToString
member.summary: Produce a string representation of a Position object
member.returns: String in the form (X, Y, Z)

member.name: F:MiniSnap.Position.X
member.summary: The x-coordinate of the position

member.name: F:MiniSnap.Position.Y
member.summary: The y-coordinate of the position

member.name: F:MiniSnap.Position.Z
member.summary: The z-coordinate of the position

member.name: T:MiniSnap.UnloadOption
member.summary: Indicates when you want the system to unload your application library from a running NX session.

member.name: F:MiniSnap.UnloadOption.Immediately
member.summary: You want the system to unload the library as soon as your application program has finished running.

member.name: F:MiniSnap.UnloadOption.Explicitly
member.summary: You will unload the library yourself, using the "Unload Shared Image" command in File-->Utilities.

member.name: F:MiniSnap.UnloadOption.AtTermination
member.summary: You want the system to unload the library when the current NX session terminates.
